description.value: The prefix a indicates that classification is first determined at autopsy. See **a-Prefix of pTNM (Variable number: 4.6)** in \'E A Struktur der Basisdaten.pdf\' (https://www.nicer.org/de/krebsregistrierung/krebsregistrierung-nach-krg-ab-112020/).

definition.value: pTNM classification is not determined at autopsy.
pTNM classification is first determined at autopsy.
No information whether pTNM is determined at autopsy or not.
